post.body: i don't know what ur talking about , coz i'm missing food in LA ATM =p
yum! u always have good food - me = left over yakisoba + pork with clear noodle sauce.
and drools on salmon sashimi
yakisoba using lean pork meat and napa cabbage + 2 pieces of beef + eggplant in spicy sauce + miso soup + OJ
no and he did? gawd ........ he sure doesn't mind seeing himself that much ....
wow ..... i'm speechless ....... should i ask you to ask him if he got any hard drive to fix?
hey how's it going over there? and yea buying something in Harajuku is so much better than being trampled in Walmart ....
H&M in great mall wait time to pay @ 1 hr
Thinking what I can get @ nijiya tmr morning - like 2 packs of instant ramen for $1 - doesn't happen THAT often
happy thanksgiving !
but now i suddenly miss ELECTRONIC TABOO -
just saw the electronic monopoly ad on TV .... PASS -
stiff neck is killing me
http://tinyurl.com/2jc35j - reading this book right now ~~
back @ home for today -- gonna start my house cleaning chores in a sec
omg ... this is the way to ultimately destroy creativity .. esp. when your trying to make a site ..... http://www.colorblender.com/
finished listening to DMC soundtrack .... death metal it is ... but it's all .... kinda tamed?
gonna listen to the DMC soundtrack once i get back to the car a lil later
woke up extra early today ..... it's finally Friday !! what a long week ~
having breakfast @ http://www.parisbaguetteusa.com/
thanks to kotaku podcast, now i want Left 4 Dead so bad ~
